name: Make Uber Moneyz in the Desert
name_original: Make Uber Moneyz in the Desert
description:
MUMD is a weird, surreal, and overall bizzare action/exploration game made in 72 hours for the #indiesvspewdiepie jam.

It is recomended you read the text file included in the download before playing; the game can be quite confusing and chaotic.

Game designed by Noah van Nostrand

Music by Joshua Van Nostrand
